item.dc:creator: mbasnet
item.description: The world around us has changed tremendously after 9/11. And no one can deny the fact how agonizing the event has been the people here in America and the rest of the world. Based on the 9/11 thousands of Muslims faced harsh and ill treatment as they became the major suspects for terrorism. As Rana stated the event resembled a moral panic among the Americans. And i agree how this resulted into violence and discrimination towards the Islamic.The Muslims since then has become the target group for terrorism. I was shocked how much Muslim American are discriminated and harassed for being who they are and how they are always associated with 9/11; especially when i saw a shirt that said " I learned everything about Islam after 9/11".
